display_long_description:
🧪 **MUTANTS: ESCAPE THE MADNESS** 🧪

Step into the terrifying world of Mutants, where you are an experimental animal trapped in a horror research facility. Explore every corner of the facility, but beware—each step could lead you into one of the many horror experiences hidden behind mysterious portals.

🎭 **EXPERIENCE TRUE HORROR** 🎭

Mutants is more than just a game. It’s the ultimate horror experience. With high-quality graphics, immersive sound design, and a deeply unsettling atmosphere, this is horror like you’ve never seen before.

🛠️ **MODS & COSMETICS GALORE** 🛠️

Use any mod that you can think of from Long Arms to Ghost Freeze! New Mods Weekly! Slow your friends down or carry them through different experiences.

Customize your monkey with a variety of cosmetics to enhance your appearance. Whether you want to blend into the shadows or stand out in style, our in-game shop has something for every monkey.

⚡ **CONSTANT UPDATES** ⚡

We’re dedicated to bringing you the highest quality monkey horror experience. Expect frequent updates packed with new content, features, and terrifying levels to keep you on the edge.

🔥 **JOIN THE MUTANT MADNESS** 🔥

Are you ready to face your fears? Join Mutants now and immerse yourself in the scariest monkey horror experience out there. It’s free to play, but can you handle the terror? Join our Discord to connect with other players and get support: https://discord.gg/wPDFXhXjyJ.
